attributes.additional_details:
Aim: 
- Improving working lives.
- Easing the burden of travel costs.
- Providing an incentive to work for the NHS.
- Reducing NHS expenses, for those who claim for travel at work.
- Allowing those who wish to commute without worry of travel costs.
- Qualified medical professionals on hand to assist with medical emergencies on the national rail. 

A simple way to drastically ease and take financial pressure off the individual lives working in the NHS that have to commute via national rail.
attributes.background:
NHS Railcard:

Reduced rail fares for NHS workers similar to the current railcards available:

- 16-25 Railcard, 
- Senior Railcard, 
- HM Forces Railcard, 
- Disabled Persons Railcard, 
- Annual Gold Railcard, 
- Network Railcard, 
- Family & Friends Railcard.
